attributes.description:
This 2008 MERCEDES-BENZ C CLASS SEDAN C200K AVANTGARDE A/T is available on sale for R149,995 it has a AUTOMATIC transmission and is a perfect SEDAN for your daily driving pleasure. It has WHITE Interior and a beautiful WHITE colour. The vehicle has only driven 159000km and is still in great condition.
Extra Details Include:

attributes.description: Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
